item.title: Binance CEO Teng 认为美国新政将为加密货币带来 "全新重启
item.description: Binance Holdings Ltd.首席执行官理查德-滕（Richard Teng）表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统领导下的美国已经摆脱了以 "有点压迫 "为标志的加密货币监管制度。【原文：The US under President Donald Trump has moved on from a crypto regulatory regime marked by “a bit of oppression”, according to Richard Teng, chief executive officer of Binance Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司正在商谈以 440 亿美元的估值进行融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，埃隆-马斯克的社交媒体公司 X（前身为 Twitter）正在洽谈以 440 亿美元的估值向投资者融资。【原文：X, Elon Musk’s social media company formerly known as Twitter, is in talks to raise money from investors at a $44 billion valuation, according to people familiar with the matter — the same price that Musk paid for the company in 2022.】

item.title: 黑爵士想谈谈过去的五年
item.description:
以C开头，但这些经济和投资经验更值得一读。【原文：

It starts with C, but these economic and investing lessons are more than worth a read.

】

item.title: ByteDance 的美国支持者称中国的增长将抵消 TikTok 禁令造成的任何损害
item.description:
一些美国 ByteDance 投资者表示，他们不需要美国 TikTok 就能成功

。【原文：

Some American ByteDance investors say they don’t need US TikTok for success

】

item.title: 乌克兰有稀土？不，只有焦土。
item.description:
特朗普总统一心想从这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家汲取营养，这只是一种幻想。【原文：

President Trump’s fixation on extracting elements from the war-torn nation is an illusion.  

】

item.title: 香港健身连锁店 Physical 被勒令清盘
item.description: 香港健身房连锁企业 Physical 的一个部门在香港收到清算令，这是债权人试图从这家本地健身企业收回资金的一系列案件中的最新一起。【原文：A unit of Hong Kong gym chain Physical received a liquidation order in Hong Kong, the latest in a string of cases by creditors trying to recoup money from the local fitness firm.】

item.title: Wintermute 表示寻求在美国扩张，将在纽约开设办事处
item.description: 加密货币做市商 Wintermute Trading Ltd. 正寻求将其业务扩展到美国，包括在纽约开设办事处，并在美国本土提供新产品。【原文：Crypto market maker Wintermute Trading Ltd. is looking to expand its operations into the US, including opening an office in New York and offering new products stateside.】

item.title: 三井物产斥资 53 亿美元与力拓合作开采澳大利亚铁矿
item.description: 日本贸易公司三井物产株式会社（Mitsui & Co.【原文：Japanese trading house Mitsui & Co. will buy a stake in an Australian iron ore project for $5.3 billion, in a bet that the global steel industry will need high-quality raw materials to support its push to go green.】

item.title: 伊朗输往中国的石油流量激增，贸易商为规避限制而努力
item.description: 本月，在贸易商消除了因美国收紧限制措施而造成的物流瓶颈之后，从伊朗流向中国的石油流量出现反弹，这使得中国这个最大进口国的买家能够转移积压的货物。【原文：Oil flows from Iran to China rebounded this month after traders smoothed out logistical bottlenecks caused by tighter US curbs, enabling buyers in the largest importer to shift a backlog of cargoes.】

item.title: 预算案公布后摩根大通将新加坡股票评级上调至增持
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）将新加坡股票评级上调至 "增持"，理由是政府对市场的支持、高股息收益率以及缓解外部经济放缓影响的财政空间。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has upgraded Singapore stocks to overweight, citing government support to the market, high dividend yields, and fiscal room to cushion the impact of an external slowdown.】

item.title: 卡森-布洛克远离中国股市的扩大反弹
item.description: 卡森-布洛克（Carson Block）长期以来对中国持怀疑态度，他认为中国股市目前的涨势并不乐观，理由是企业会计不可靠和地缘政治风险。【原文：Carson Block, a longtime China skeptic, is giving the nation’s current stock market rally a miss, citing unreliability in corporate accounting and geopolitical risks.】

item.title: 中国称对欧盟白兰地的反倾销调查仍在继续
item.description: 在去年的初步调查导致采取反倾销措施后，中国表示将继续调查来自欧盟的白兰地倾销行为。【原文：China said it is pressing ahead with a probe into dumping of brandy from the European Union, after a preliminary investigation led to anti-dumping measures last year.】

item.title: 大亨古普塔的澳大利亚钢铁厂被迫停产
item.description: 印度大亨桑吉夫-古普塔（Sanjeev Gupta）拥有的一个钢铁厂项目因其 GFG 联盟未能支付特许权使用费而被南澳大利亚州政府下令接管。【原文：A steelworks project owned by Indian tycoon Sanjeev Gupta has been ordered into administration by the South Australia government after his GFG Alliance failed to pay royalties.】

item.title: 马来西亚安瓦尔被要求为特朗普缓和以色列-哈马斯言论
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）已被政府官员建议缓和其与以色列-哈马斯战争有关的言论，以避免美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的审查或报复。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim has been advised by government officials to soften his rhetoric related to the Israel-Hamas war to avoid any scrutiny or retaliation from US President Donald Trump, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度电子制造企业在持续的市场疲软中下滑
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 股票需求飙升，香港银行动用2019年以来最多资金
item.description: 本周二，香港银行借入了五年多来最大一笔短期现金，以满足对本地股票的旺盛需求。【原文：Hong Kong banks borrowed the largest amount of short-term cash in more than five years on Tuesday, as they sought to keep up with a booming demand for local equities.】

item.title: 花旗银行预测铜价将受美国关税影响而下跌
item.description: 在花旗集团指出美国关税对需求的影响可能导致价格回落之后，伦敦铜价下跌。【原文：Copper in London declined after Citigroup Inc. flagged risks of a pullback in prices from the impact of US tariffs on demand.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁加征汽车关税，日本向美国提出汽车关税问题
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对汽车进口征收 25% 的关税后，日本向美国提出了汽车关税问题，此举很可能会对日本经济造成巨大打击。【原文：Japan has raised the issue of auto tariffs with the US after President Donald Trump threatened to impose a 25% levy on car imports, a move that likely would deliver a big blow to Japan’s economy.】

item.title: 卡莱尔集团旗下 Hexaware 公司将在印度今年首次十亿美元 IPO 后亮相
item.description: 卡莱尔集团公司（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc.’s Hexaware Technologies Ltd. will begin trading in Mumbai on Wednesday after India’s first billion-dollar initial public offering of the year.】

item.title: 中国新房价格微跌显示市场趋稳
item.description: 1 月份，中国新房价格降幅连续第五个月放缓，这表明随着政策制定者加大力度结束房地产市场的低迷，房价开始趋于稳定。【原文：China’s decline in new-home prices eased for a fifth month in January, suggesting values are beginning to stabilize as policymakers step up efforts to end the property slump.】

item.title: 新西兰第三次大幅降息振兴经济
item.description: 新西兰中央银行连续第三次降息 50 个基点，以帮助重振疲弱的经济，并表示将在未来几个季度采取更多宽松措施。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank cut interest rates by 50 basis points for the third straight meeting to help revive the ailing economy and signaled more easing in coming quarters.】

item.title: 澳大利亚工资增长进一步放缓，印证澳大利亚央行降息决定
item.description: 去年最后三个月，澳大利亚的工资增长进一步放缓，反映出整个经济的价格压力有所缓解，也证明了储备银行最终放宽货币政策的决定是正确的。【原文：Australia’s wage growth slowed further in the final three months of last year, reflecting an easing in price pressures across the economy and vindicating the Reserve Bank’s decision to finally ease monetary policy.】

item.title: iPhone 零件制造商村田制作所将供应链转向印度
item.description: IPhone 元件制造商村田制作所（Murata Manufacturing Co.【原文：IPhone components maker Murata Manufacturing Co. is weighing moving some production capacity to India, reflecting a global realignment of the supply chain toward the world’s most populous country.】

item.title: 中国修改电力市场规则，挑战可再生能源的蓬勃发展
item.description: 中国可再生能源的空前繁荣正面临着来自政府规定的新挑战，这些规定将允许市场力量决定新的风能和太阳能发电的价格。【原文：China’s unprecedented boom in renewable energy is facing a fresh challenge from government rules that will allow market forces to determine the price of new wind and solar power.】

item.title: 研究院称体育债务有望成为证券化的最新抵押品
item.description: Academy Securities Inc.周二发布的一份报告称，体育赛事门票销售可能成为下一种债务证券化的抵押品，尤其是随着越来越多的投资公司抢购职业运动队的股票。【原文：Ticket sales to sporting events could become collateral for the next type of debt securitization, according to a Tuesday note from Academy Securities Inc., especially as more investment firms snap up shares of professional sports teams.】

item.title: 模拟器件将回购金额提高 100 亿美元，并增加股息
item.description: 模拟器件公司将其股票回购计划增加了 100 亿美元，并提高了股息，在周三发布季度报告之前回报股东。【原文：Analog Devices Inc. increased its stock repurchase program by $10 billion and raised its dividend, moving to reward shareholders ahead of the chipmaker’s quarterly report on Wednesday.】

item.title: 关税和地缘政治忧虑助推黄金需求，黄金价格接近历史纪录
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发出了新的关税威胁，加上地缘政治不确定性不断增加，避险需求升温，黄金在历史高位附近持稳。【原文：Gold was steady near a record high, with fresh tariff threats from President Donald Trump and mounting geopolitical uncertainties fanning haven demand.】

item.title: 鉴于特朗普援助关系紧张，南非预算受到更多审查
item.description: 南非财政部长面临着压力，他必须制定一条经济路线，以应对唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战所带来的危险。【原文：South Africa’s finance minister is under pressure to chart an economic course that navigates the hazards unleashed by Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 印度胃炎疫情创纪录，显示潜伏健康风险
item.description: 2024 年，急性腹泻疫情飙升至有记录以来的最高点，这是全球最常见的细菌和病毒性疾病也出现异常疫情的最新例证。【原文：Outbreaks of acute diarrheal disease surged to the highest on record in 2024, in the latest example of unusual surges of even the most common bacterial and viral ailments across the world.】

item.title: 特朗普关税措施出台前日本出口再度增长
item.description: 就在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普推出一系列预计将在未来数月生效的保护主义政策之际，由于企业增加订单，日本 1 月份的出口增速加快。【原文：Japan’s exports rose at a faster clip in January as businesses ramped up orders just as US President Donald Trump unleashed a barrage of protectionist policies expected to take effect in coming months.】
